hackathon-description-text: It is increasingly difficult to have a conversation on disruptive technology without referencing blockchain and the cryptocurrency industry. The WCEF Crypto Hackathon encourages development of this field by providing talented crypto and blockchain app developers with the opportunity and platform to share their ideas with top entrepreneurs, industry experts, and members of the greater tech community.
hackathon-requirements:
Well challenge  
POA challenge 
: 

 for smart contracts via Propy

1) Must be decentalized
2) Files must have persistent addresses
3) File owners must have an ability to give and revoke access to their files
hackathon-description-header: An event for creating and sharing world-changing blockchain apps and crypto projects
